name: behsseui
description: Add behsseui components to your projects

scripts.cli:publish: cd packages/cli && pnpm build && npm publish
scripts.cli:publish:patch: cd packages/cli && npm version patch && pnpm build && npm publish
scripts.cli:publish:minor: cd packages/cli && npm version minor && pnpm build && npm publish
scripts.cli:publish:major: cd packages/cli && npm version major && pnpm build && npm publish
